`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(a.h2,{children:"Controller"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-46d9fb2f-73ca-4f43-b4fd-c77f5e265a20.mdx",lineNumber:26,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(a.pre,{children:(0,l.jsxDEV)(a.code,{className:"language-js",children:`// controllers/parkingController.js\r
\r
const sequelize = require("../config/config");\r
\r
exports.getParkings = async (req, res) => {\r
  const { latitude, longitude, radius } = req.query;\r
  if (!latitude || !longitude || !radius) {\r
    return res.status(400).send("\uD30C\uB77C\uBBF8\uD130 \uC785\uB825 \uC624\uB958");\r
  }\r
  const query = \`\r
    SELECT *, ST_Distance_Sphere(\r
      point(longitude, latitude),\r
      point(:longitude, :latitude)) AS distance\r
    FROM parkings\r
    WHERE ST_Distance_Sphere(\r
      point(longitude, latitude),\r
      point(:longitude, :latitude)) <= :radius\r
    ORDER BY distance;\r
  \`;\r
\r
  try {\r
    const parkingSpots = await sequelize.query(query, {\r
      replacements: {\r
        longitude,\r
        latitude,\r
        radius,\r
      },\r
      type: sequelize.QueryTypes.SELECT,\r
    });\r
    res.json(parkingSpots);\r
  } catch (error) {\r
    res.status(500).json({ error: error.message });\r
  }\r
};
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-46d9fb2f-73ca-4f43-b4fd-c77f5e265a20.mdx",lineNumber:28,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-46d9fb2f-73ca-4f43-b4fd-c77f5e265a20.mdx",lineNumber:28,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(a.h2,{children:"Router"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-46d9fb2f-73ca-4f43-b4fd-c77f5e265a20.mdx",lineNumber:65,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(a.pre,{children:(0,l.jsxDEV)(a.code,{className:"language-js",children:`// routes/parkingRoutes.js\r
\r
const express = require("express");\r
const router = express.Router();\r
const parkingController = require("../controllers/parkingController.js");\r
\r
router.get("/parking", parkingController.getParkings);\r
\r
module.exports = router;
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-46d9fb2f-73ca-4f43-b4fd-c77f5e265a20.mdx",lineNumber:67,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-46d9fb2f-73ca-4f43-b4fd-c77f5e265a20.mdx",lineNumber:67,columnNumber:1},this)]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-46d9fb2f-73ca-4f43-b4fd-c77f5e265a20.mdx",lineNumber:1,columnNumber:1},this)}function gr(f={}){let{wrapper:a}=f.components||{};return a?(0,l.jsxDEV)(a,Object.assign({},f,{children:(0,l.jsxDEV)(Se,f,void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-46d9fb2f-73ca-4f43-b4fd-c77f5e265a20.mdx"},this)}),void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-46d9fb2f-73ca-4f43-b4fd-c77f5e265a20.mdx"},this):Se(f)}var _r=gr;return pr(hr);})();
